import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listOrders } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderListScreen({ history }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderList = useSelector(state => state.orderList) const {loading, error, orders} = orderList const userLogin= useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin useEffect(() => { if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin){ dispatch(listOrders()) }else{ history.push('/login') } }, [dispatch, history, userInfo]) return (

Orders

{loading ? : error ? ({error}) : ( {orders.map(order => ( ))}
ID User Date Total Paid Delivered
{order._id} {order.user && order.user.name} {order.createdAt.substring(0, 10)} ${order.totalPrice} {order.isPaid ? ( order.paidAt.substring(0, 10) ) : ( )} {order.isDelivered ? ( order.deliveredAt.substring(0, 10) ) : ( )}
) }
) } export default OrderListScreen
